abstract: Jung Sung-Ryong (Hangul: 정성룡; born 4 January 1985) is a South Korean football goalkeeper, who currently plays for the South Korean national team and Suwon Bluewings in the K-League.
comment: Jung Sung-Ryong (Hangul: 정성룡; born 4 January 1985) is a South Korean football goalkeeper, who currently plays for the South Korean national team and Suwon Bluewings in the K-League.
